original: intros l i e Hsorted Hin Heq. unfold findAtIndex. remember (removeAfterIndex l i) as l'. symmetry in Heql'. destruct (eIndex e =? i) eqn:Heq. - apply Nat.eqb_eq in Heq. rewrite <- Heq, Heq. apply findAtIndex_intro; auto. - apply Nat.eqb_neq in Heq. assert (Hin': ~ In e l'). { intros Hin'. apply Hin, removeAfterIndex_in in Hin'. contradict Hin'; subst; auto. } apply findAtIndex_not_in in Heq; auto. contradiction.
